product_overview: Zen Sticker is a comprehensive e-commerce platform specialized for customizable stickers, offering both a public storefront for customers and a robust admin panel for site management. The platform supports advanced campaign management, secure payment integration, user authentication, and responsive design optimized for all device types.
core_goals: Provide a user-friendly and visually appealing public storefront that allows customers to browse, customize, and purchase sticker products easily.
Enable comprehensive product and campaign management through a secure and efficient admin panel.
Support a seamless and secure checkout experience with integration of PayTR payment gateway in test mode for safe transactions.
Ensure responsive design and accessibility for all user flows across different devices.
Implement advanced campaign discount logic supporting various discount types to maximize sales.
Maintain a dynamic site with customizable settings, static pages, media library, and SEO optimizations.
Offer robust order and user management features, including order tracking and user profile management.
Guarantee all forms have thorough validation and that the application maintains consistent performance and reliability.
key_features: Public Facing Storefront with category browsing, campaigns, detailed product pages with customization options, cart and checkout workflows.
Complete Admin Panel for product, category, campaign, banner, static pages, order, user, and site settings management with full CRUD capabilities.
User Authentication supporting registration, login, and profile management using NextAuth.js.
Advanced Campaign System with percentage discounts, fixed discounts, category-specific and product-specific deals, and package campaigns.
Shopping Cart supporting item add, remove, quantity update and discount calculations.
PayTR Payment Gateway Integration with test mode for secure transaction testing without real payments.
Order Tracking and Management allowing users and admins to view and update order details and statuses.
Banner Management with image sliders, positioning, and responsive display.
Dynamic Site Settings including colors, logos, header marquee text, WhatsApp integration, and footer links.
Static Page Management with a content editor and automatic footer integration.
Media Library for reusable images and videos.
Custom Sticker Options allowing personalization with font choices, live previews, and character counters.
SEO Optimization with meta tags, JSON-LD schema, sitemap, and robots.txt configuration.
user_flow_summary: Public users browse categories, view campaign listings, and explore product details with customization where applicable.
Users can add products to their cart, update quantities, apply campaign discounts, and proceed to secure checkout using PayTR in test mode.
Registered users can register, login, view and update profiles, and track their order histories.
Guests and registered users can track shipments via the cargo tracking page.
Admins log in through a secure admin panel to manage products, categories, campaigns, banners, static pages, orders, site settings, and users.

Admins perform CRUD operations including adding new products with images/videos, creating and editing campaigns, managing banners with images and links, configuring site-wide settings, and maintaining static page content.
Order statuses can be updated by admins and customers can view their order tracking and status.
Responsive design ensures seamless experience across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices for all user interactions.
validation_criteria: All public storefront pages and features load correctly and respond without errors on all supported browsers and devices.
Admin panel CRUD operations function completely and correctly with data persisting and reflecting in the UI.
User authentication flows (registration, login, profile update) validate inputs and securely manage user sessions.
PayTR payment integration operates strictly in test mode, preventing real transactions, and handles success and failure gracefully.
Campaign discounts are calculated accurately for all discount types and applied correctly in product pricing and cart totals.
All forms include proper client-side and server-side validation, including email format, phone number, mandatory fields, and password rules.
Responsive design is validated across screen sizes without visual glitches or usability issues.
SEO elements such as meta tags, JSON-LD, sitemap, and robots.txt are verified to be correct and accessible.
Order management features allow accurate status updates and correct display of order details for customers and admins.
Static pages and site settings updates appear immediately and persist as expected.
Performance metrics meet acceptable thresholds ensuring smooth and fast user experiences.
No critical bugs or crashes occur during normal and edge user interactions, especially during checkout and admin operations.
